EmailTemplate.name: Send SFO Instructions
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce plugin for Outlook - Installation Instructions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Contents: Instructions for installing Salesforce Plugin for Outlook {!User.FirstName},
Attached is the ITA CRM Salesforce for Outlook Installation Instructions. Please Note your machines should receive the package in approximately a half hour (may vary). Please advise if you do not receive package with 1.5 hours.
Please advise if you have any issues with install or the instructions. Thanks.
Regards,
Tom Gilbride
ITA CorePLUS CRM PM
Acumen Solutions, Inc.
O: 202-482-5063
M: 703-346-3341
